name: react-service-provider
description: Very simple general services provider implementation, to be able to inject services in any component inside of an application

scripts.build: rollup -c --environment FORMAT:umd && rollup -c --environment FORMAT:cjs && rollup -c --environment FORMAT:es
scripts.test: echo "Error: adding tests and docs soon" && exit 1
